item.title: FAX On The Run
item.description: Fax machines have long been the go-to for urgent business documents, with large companies utilizing massive machines and smaller offices relying on all-in-one devices. However, these machines share a common limitation: they are tethered to a physical location. This restriction is eliminated with internet faxing, which allows sending and receiving faxes from any location with internet access, whether it’s a cafe, hotel, airport, or even using mobile broadband. This technology is readily accessible at an affordable price.

item.title: Take Your Office PC With You
item.description: Mobile professionals often rely on their laptops but might find themselves needing files left on their office desktops. Traveling long distances back for these files isn’t always feasible. Imagine accessing your office desktop from anywhere, anytime. This eliminates the worry of having the right files and removes the need for duplicates. Your laptop and a special application are all you need to make any computer your office computer. GoToMyPC is a remote access software, or KVM application, that allows this.

item.title: Your Cell Phone IS Your Business Phone System
item.description: Why invest in a large, expensive office phone system when you’re an independent professional constantly on the move? If your work revolves around sales or consulting, your mobile phone might be the only phone system you need. It doesn’t make sense for clients to call your office if you’re rarely there. When they call your mobile number, you’re reachable regardless of location. You can always let calls go to voicemail, eliminating the need to rush back to the office just to check messages.
